title: RUNDUM-SORGLOS-PAKET
desc: Der Prozess der Erstellung und des Hostings einer Website von Grund auf ist schwierig und zeitaufwendig.

bulletpoints.bulletpoint: Planing & implementing your goals for the website
Building Wireframing for desktop and handheld devices
From the beginning the focus is on UX/UI, Conversion and Accessibility.
Converting design mockups with HTML/CSS and Javascript
Developing static sites with the latest technologies
Testing accessibility and reviewing the design
Increasing the traffic on your landing page and optimize your conversions
